original: AHLSON, Carl Göran Sixten, Civilingenjör, Stockholm, f Mjölby 10/7 96 av postmast J R A o Maria Hagelin. Studex Örebro 15, KTH (kemi) 17—21. Resoffex 17, fänr i Dalreg:s res 17, ulöjtn 19, löjtn 22. Fabr.ch v J A Hedberg & Co AB Henriksdal fr 28. Led Sv Tekn.frn.
translated: AHLSON, Carl Göran Sixten, Civil Engineer, Stockholm, b. Mjölby 10/7 1896, son of postmaster J R A and Maria Hagelin. Studied in Örebro until 1915, and at the Royal Institute of Technology (chemistry) from 1917 to 1921. Officer candidate in 1917, became second lieutenant in the Dalarna regiment in 1917, lieutenant in 1922. Factory manager at J A Hedberg & Co AB Henriksdal from 1928. Member of the Swedish Association of Technical Professionals. Married in [missing information].

employment.employer: J A Hedberg & Co AB Henriksdal

career.workplace: J A Hedberg & Co AB Henriksdal
